post.title: projects on the farm
post.body:
- organic fresh produce based on the aquaponic system
- building the first major dam: about 100m by 100m
- survey the land: flora and fauna
- drafting the master plan for its long term development: a village? a university?

post.title: education and farm
post.body:
at least one major unviersity i know call itself the farm. well, here is another one. we are the farm, for college 34.

throughout, we will ask, and try to answer these questions:

- why farm is important for learning and innovation?
- why farm will remain the pillar for quality human life, society, and her future?
- can we build farm in space? 
- go beyond earth farm.

post.title: what is a valid location?
post.body:
- you can own it as long as you want; 
- it is safe, stable; you can live there, you can freely build; you can grow whatever you want as long as it is legal; basically, a place you can and feel want to call it home.

post.title: location is everything
the chinese names and so on
post.body:
location - Rappville, New South Wales
chinese name - 
瑞威尔 （someone has taken this）
瑞谷
澳瑞山谷

post.title: About us
post.body: We are a farm dedicated to growing the organic fresh produce of all edible vegetables in the world.
